item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World One of my goals for 2023 is to start a professional site/blog as I continue my journey as Software Developer. The main goal of this blog is to do more learning in public and to share what I learn with the people who find this blog. WhoAmI My name is Ryan Monaghan I’m currently a software engineer who primarily focuses on C#. I’ve been a software developer for about 3 years and before that, I taught High School Computer Science.

item.title: About
item.description: Ryan Monaghan ryan (at) monaghan (dot) xyz Dallas, Texas Summary Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the financial and health insurances industries. Skilled in C#, Microsoft SQL, Go-Lang, Azure, AWS, Vue, and React. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Science (BS) focused in Mathematics from The University of Texas at Dallas. Work Experience Evry Health Dec 2021 - Present Software Engineer Alkammi Technology Aug 2019 - Dec 2021
